comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "The name of the mountain was formerly spelled "Mount Kosciusko," an Anglicisation; but the version "Mount Kosciuszko" was officially adopted in 1997 by the Geographical Names Board of New South Wales." --Wikipedia Size Does Matter! "Various measurements of the peak originally called by that name showed it to be slightly lower than its neighbour, Mount Townsend, and the names were thereupon transposed by the New South Wales Lands Department, so that Mount Kosciuszko still remains the name of the highest peak of Australia, and Mount Townsend ranks as second." -- Year Book Australia, 1910

comment.author: 30182791@N08
comment._content: it reminds me the old time. beautiful photo!

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This was one of a number of pics which accompanied an article on Wragge's observatory at Mt Kosciuszko which photographer Charles Kerry wrote for the Sydney Mail in December 1897...the pics appeared on p. 1363 (I can't work out how to link to the pics!). The SM caption had 'Wragge & Party' - news.google.com/newspapers?id=FvlPAAAAIBAJ&sjid=JZUDA... other pics in the SM 25/12/1897 - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3594415758/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3593606829/in/photostream/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3594417844/] Pic in the T&CJ 25/12/1897 trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/71281410 - [http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3370009048/] ; Also of interest is this 1899 SM article by B. De Burgh Newth - news.google.com/newspapers?id=wk9VAAAAIBAJ&sjid=LpUDA... Also of interest is this 1897 Sydney Mail article 'The First WInter Ascent of Kosciusko' ...Kerry's pics appear on p. 871 - news.google.com/newspapers?id=DflPAAAAIBAJ&sjid=JZUDA... Also of interest are the various Alpine Club and ski-ing articles which appeared in the newspapers and featured Kerry's pics - T&CJ 1897 - 'In the Australian Snow Country' - nla.gov.au/nla.news-page5237811 T&CJ 1900 - 'Ski Racing on the Snowy Mountains' - nla.gov.au/nla.news-page5334688 Sydney Mail 1900 - 'In Australia's Snowfields'...includes a photo of Charles Kerry - news.google.com/newspapers?id=tgFQAAAAIBAJ&sjid=-5QDA... Sydney Mail 1906 - 'The Snow Hills of NSW' (pics pp. 815-818) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=p4NVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=zZUDA... includes a pic of Wragge's observatory becoming past tense. Sydney Mail 1908 - 'Snow Sport in New South Wales' - This is how things looked by 1908 (see article on pp. 217-227) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=9SRVAAAAIBAJ&sjid=DpUDA... Sydney Mail 1910 - 'A Winter Climb to the Top of Mount Kosciusko' - news.google.com/newspapers?id=YEsQAAAAIBAJ&sjid=HJIDA...
